debt_section: As of December 31, 2023, Walmart Inc. had total debt of $33,653 million. The company's leverage ratio was 2.3x EBITDA. Management remains committed to maintaining investment-grade credit ratings and strong liquidity.
earnings_excerpt: Walmart Inc. reported strong results for fiscal year 2023. Operating margin was 17.3%, reflecting continued focus on operational efficiency. Management provided guidance for continued growth in the coming year.
